Plot: A documentary on the life of renowned Brazilian musician Marcelo Yuka, who was shot nine times in the streets of Rio de Janeiro in 2000 and became one of the main voices of social justice and peace in Brazil.
Title: Marcelo Yuka no Caminho das Setas (Marcelo Yuka: Follow the Signs)
Actors: Marcelo Yuka, Aleh, Amora Pêra, Bnegão
